divs: Sighting Detailsstanding in back yard. looked up to the south west and saw white ball with tail heading east to eastwest. It was there and then was gone.I live by small airport and I watch the airplanes. I thought it might be a shooting star. But now I read that you can only see them after dark.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Casa Grande
There was one other sighting in Casa Grande on or around November 21st 2008
